DOC.brief_summary: This study early ( product development process ) feasibility study . It shall evaluate device design concept respect device functionality new fluid fill breast pump small number subject .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Functionality Fluid Filled Single Breast Pump
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Female 18 year Participant establish milk flow , general rule : approx . 50 ml per breast per pump session The participant pump least 2 time week The participant 16 month give birth ( postpartum ) day data assessment The participant agree pump fee last time minimum 3 hour start pump session The participant agree pump breast milk feed infant ( dispose ) The participant agree photograph video record breast upper body ( face ) The participant agree presence 3 men room pump session Exclusion criterion : Participant baby dependent lifesustaining electric device ( e.g . heart pacemaker , insulin pump , etc . ) Participant medical condition breast Participant allergic plastic silicone
